name: GhostGame
0:
”Alexa, start ghost game”
”New round”
”My letter is A”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ghost game
des:
Challenging word game to train your gray matter and extend your vocabulary. 

Rules are simple: you tell the letter, app tells next letter, who ends with a complete word loose the round. 

So far it plays only with single words (so it will never guess an Old English Sheepdog or a Whale Shark for instance). You can use only nouns and never names, cities or else. 

If you face problems with one letter recognition, try to use NATO phonetic alphabet: : Alfa, Bravo, Charlie, Delta, etc. Or just try saying any word starting with your letter.
